attributes.action: modify this site to allow opposition to petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petitions are signed only by those who agree with them. This is undemocratic, and this site should be modified to allow people to register their opposition to petitions, which would give a more balanced view.

rejection.details: Many thanks for this feedback. We will consider this very seriously while we review how this beta testing phase has worked. Your thoughts are very welcome.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
